actionIcon.description:
An IconButton element to be used as secondary action target
(primary action target is the tile itself).

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

subtitle.description: String or element serving as subtitle (support text).

title.description: Title to be displayed on tile.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.titlePositionBottom: Styles applied to the root element if `titlePosition="bottom"`.
descriptions.titlePositionTop: Styles applied to the root element if `titlePosition="top"`.
descriptions.rootSubtitle: Styles applied to the root element if a `subtitle` is provided.
descriptions.titleWrap: Styles applied to the title and subtitle container element.
descriptions.titleWrapActionPosLeft: Styles applied to the container element if `actionPosition="left"`.
descriptions.titleWrapActionPosRight: Styles applied to the container element if `actionPosition="right"`.
descriptions.title: Styles applied to the title container element.
descriptions.subtitle: Styles applied to the subtitle container element.
descriptions.actionIcon: Styles applied to the actionIcon if supplied.
descriptions.actionIconActionPosLeft: Styles applied to the actionIcon if `actionPosition="left"`.
